section.title: Learning
section.description: Curated books, videos, and resources that shaped my engineering philosophy

items.title: Serverless Architectures
items.description: A comprehensive primer by Mike Roberts on serverless architectures, explaining BaaS and FaaS, how they change application design and scaling, and the real-world benefits, drawbacks, and future directions of building systems without managing servers directly.

items.imageLabel: The Four Pillars of Engineering Management: Building High-Performance Teams
items.title: The Four Pillars of Engineering Management: Building High-Performance Teams
items.description: A practical framework for engineering management that starts with self-management, detailing how emotional intelligence, focused time management, and clear operating principles enable leaders to build and sustain high-performing teams.

items.title: Team OKRs in Action
items.description: An in-depth guide by Paulo Caroli on making **Team OKRs** a practical bridge between strategy and delivery, emphasizing co-created goals, collaborative alignment (rather than top-down cascades), and a lightweight cycle of planning, check-ins, and retrospectives that high-performing teams use to own outcomes.

items.imageLabel: Lessons I Learned at Google - Dave Rensin
items.title: Lessons I Learned at Google - Dave Rensin
items.description: A candid reflection from Google engineering leader Dave Rensin, distilling ten lessons on leadership, support, ambition, and humility‚Äîfrom ‚Äútake every call‚Äù and ‚Äúask the hard question‚Äù to treating every interaction as an audition for your future career.

items.embedTitle: Engineering Management; The Missing Manual (Dave Rensin)
items.title: Engineering Management; The Missing Manual (Dave Rensin)
items.description: In this talk, Google engineering leader Dave Rensin presents a neuroscience-based framework for engineering management that focuses on reducing team anxiety by replacing central control with clear principles and distributed decision-making.

items.title: Machine Learning with MLOps
items.description: Machine learning pipeline from building core models to deploying them in production using tools like MLFLow, Docker and Kubernetes.
